hero.title: Empowering Traditional Professions
hero.subtitle: Building markets and inclusivity for the working class

mission.part1: Create Livelihood Apps: We build apps that help people stuck in caste-based professions with no value today, providing them with new opportunities and enhancing their livelihoods.
mission.part2: Put Technologically Marginalized First: Our apps are designed with their needs in mind, focusing on what they need to improve their work and lives.
mission.part3: Ensure Privacy and Security: We make sure our apps are safe to use, protecting the privacy and personal information of the technologically marginalized.
mission.part4: Improve Work Standards: Our goal is to help the technologically marginalized do their jobs better, making their work more efficient and improving their overall standards.
mission.part5: Inclusive Technology: We aim to create opportunities for people who are often overlooked by big tech companies.
mission.part6: Create Digital Markets: We develop platforms where the technologically marginalized can sell their products, expanding their reach and helping them grow their businesses.

why_join.intro: Working in a cooperative provides a supportive and collaborative environment that is often missing in corporate culture. Here are some benefits:
why_join.benefit1: Community Focus: Cooperatives are built around the idea of community and mutual support. This creates a work environment where everyone's contributions are valued.
why_join.benefit2: Inclusive Decision-Making: In a cooperative, decisions are made democratically, giving everyone a voice. This contrasts with corporate structures where decisions are often top-down.
why_join.benefit3: Fair Distribution of Profits: Profits in a cooperative are distributed more equitably among members, rather than primarily benefiting top executives.
why_join.benefit4: Focus on Sustainability: Cooperatives often prioritize sustainable practices and long-term community benefits over short-term profits.
why_join.benefit5: Work-Life Balance: The cooperative model tends to support better work-life balance, with more flexible working conditions compared to many corporate jobs.

services.title: Our Services
services.service1: Market Access: Providing digital platforms for traditional professions.
services.service2: Support & Training: Offering technical support and training for digital tools.
services.service3: Community Building: Connecting professionals and fostering community growth.
services.service4: Advocacy: Promoting the rights and interests of traditional professions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Contact Us: Reach out via phone, email, or our online form.
howItWorks.step2: Schedule a Session: Choose a convenient time for your tech help session.
howItWorks.step3: Get Assistance: Receive personalized help from our friendly experts.
howItWorks.step4: Follow Up: We follow up to ensure your tech issues are resolved and you're satisfied.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.quote1: This service has transformed my small business by connecting me to new customers and opportunities.

form.title: Submit a Suggestion
form.name: Name
form.description: We are seeking your suggestions for traditional professions that are most affected by technology. Please consider factors such as gender, region, caste, and class when listing the professions.
